title: Is there any way to hide the LeaverBuster timer.
body: Often times when i wait for a queue, I spend time messaging, browsing the store, etc.. But the leaver buster system makes it impossible, since the seemingly unhideable popup literally makes the client unusable. I was wondering if there is anyway to hide it or if you just have to live with this issue.

replies.body: Currently, there isn't a method of minimizing the leaverbuster timer.  In its current state, it's important to make sure that you've taken care of anything as well as troubleshoot any problems causing a player to leave before queuing up.  I'm not sure how this feature works with the alpha client, so it's really important to resolve whatever is causing the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  Let me know if you need any help, and I'd be happy to lend a hand!
